message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper proposes a novel multimodal attention-based method for audio-visual speech recognition, which involves both natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with the intersection of these two fields. Additionally, the paper heavily relies on visual information, so cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is also a likely category. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which are commonly found in cs.SD (Sound), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.MM (Multimedia).
